tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (1)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  CARING  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: If you need ANT101 as most of us do, choose wisely and pick her. So long as you attend class, STAY AWAKE in class, participate in class, act RESPECTFULLY (I don\'t know why this is so difficult for college students) and complete the FEW written assignments that are given, you get an A. Well worth it, and she\'s funny. She truly cares -that\'s rare.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (1)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: honestly i think she was a bit lazy in grading things. i handed in a paper and she didnt grade it for 2 months lol. she lets us out early all the time which is good for a 3 hour lecture. her lectures are just discussions and videos. the class consists of 5 one page HWs, and 1 five page paper

comments: She made a 3 hour night class worth it. You have to be apart of the class conversation to get a good grade. Interesting topics. A few two page papers, no test and one final 5 page paper. Good class for an easy, but very interesting A.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (1)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Professor Castilla-Brooks is AWESOME! By far the best professor I\'ve had at SCCC. She is fun, down to earth, and makes this class super interesting. She\'s very helpful and lenient. Come to class, do your work, participate, and you will get an A. 4 short responses and 1 very interesting research paper, no exams. She\'s the best.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (1)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She\'s awesome! Taught a lot of real-life lessons in the class. No tests, only a long-ish midterm paper and 4 short responses. Definitely recommended for anybody who needs an easy grade and who doesn\'t mind passing the time in a conversation driven lesson.
